Articles.Content: Its something minor, but could we have a button or hotkey ingame to toggle the EVA_ROTATE_ON_MOVE option between true and false, rather than having to change it in the settings everytime?

-

Edited January 20, 2020 by Guest
i think he means that in eva he needs a button to allow for rotations instead of using the camera to rotate
Either that, or he means that when rotating the camera it doesn't rotate the kerbal automatically, which I presume is how the system works.

Its an option in your settings.cfg that toggles wether or not your Kerbal will automatically reorient himself to your camera when he moves. Id like to be able to see my Kerbals face as he flies or walks around rather than always just the back.
It's toggled with Alt (which is labelled 'mod' in the key bindings list - http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_Bindings)

Oh wow. Never knew the mod key would do that too.

Thanks :-).
